name: Xeno Runners
description:
High-Speed Aerial Racing: Soar through the alien skies at incredible speeds, weaving through energy rings suspended in the atmosphere. Master the art of precision flying as you navigate hairpin turns, daring loops, and gravity-defying drops.

Time Trial Challenge: Race against the clock in heart-pounding time trials across multiple circuits. Every millisecond counts, and only the most skilled pilots will conquer the leaderboard. Can you set the ultimate record and become the undisputed champion?

Boost Through Ring Mastery: Collect energy-boosting rings strategically scattered throughout each circuit. Skilfully catching them not only adds to your speed but also unlocks the full potential of your flying robot.

Over 20 unique tracks to compete against the clock



Changing weather conditions: Adapt your flying skills to the changing weather system and the diverse lighting conditions.



Alien World Exploration: Immerse yourself in a visually stunning alien planet and its otherworldly landscapes, vibrant atmospheres, and mysterious landmarks, Fly at your own leisure, free from the clock pressure.

Unlockables: Complete races/achievements to unlock more circuits and new robots to fly with. Unlock the ultimate flying machine in order to make History…

Reward system based on performance (1/2/3 stars)

Achievements: Over 50 Steam achievements
